attributes.action: The gov needs to add more funding to CAMHS as trans suicide rates are to high
attributes.additional_details: I want the gov to do it as trans suicide rates are at a all time high and we need to protect and support the trans youth in the United Kingdom
attributes.background: The gov needs to allocate more funding to services like CAMHS as the waiting list is far to long for anyone to wait to get their support and puts that at more danger from long waiting lists.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/620846

We have also published the following petition, which you might like to sign:

Increase funding for NHS transgender services: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/616754
